participant_1.background:
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.
i have a gambling problem.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
i want to have two kids.
I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices.
i was born in san francisco.
i cuddle up with my dog every night.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing good, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go flying, I'm a pilot. I also like to cuddle up with my dog every night. What do you like to do?
I like to read books and spend time with my son. I also like to gamble, but I'm trying to quit. I have been in a relationship for 2 years and I want to have two kids someday.
I see, that's really cool. I hope you can quit gambling. I'm glad you have a son, I want to have two kids someday too. I'm from San Francisco, where are you from?
I'm from California too, but I live in New York now.
Oh cool, I've never been to New York.
It's a great city, but it's really busy.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a pilot for a small airline.
Oh wow, that's really cool! How do you like it?
I love it! I get to see the world and meet new people.
